snippet: Jordan Spieth made a 12-foot birdie putt on the final hole for a seven-under 66 to share the lead after one round of the Tournament of Champions in Hawaii.
abstract: Jordan Spieth shares four-way tie for first-round lead at the Tournament of Champions golf tournament.
lead_paragraph: Jordan Spieth made a 12-foot birdie putt on the final hole for a seven-under 66 to share the lead after one round of the Tournament of Champions in Hawaii.
